text: just get my medicine from clinic, both malay nurse at reception are very friendly, nice talker. female doctor, i forgot to ask her name, was also very soft talk, patiently listening and asking for sickness status. Good job! keep it up!!
Went for a health checkup, the staff were all super sweet and took the time to patiently explain each step. The staff at front desk were also very nice, kudos to the team!
Honestly a zero would be better but it isnt an option. Extremely rude locum indian doctor who did not listen to the patient and only focused on defending his own actions.
Staff clinic are nice n friendly. Doc was very friendly too. Very good service!

Embarrassment to the company reputation. Dirty surrounding, in pro foreign staffs.  Could not even communicate professionally.  Like waiting for VIPS
Today from. 4pm the phone is engaged.  I have to call to bukit batik to enquiere re-open operation time.  Does not make sense.  Today consultation the Chinese ursher nurse raise his voice on me for asking what is my purpose of visit.  I told him I need medication, he asked me if I need to see a doctor.  He told me scan & wait for him in his rude manner when I told him I need to register.  Kindly advocate this disgraceful personnel on his proffesionalism, manner and communication skill.  He potrays the reputation of Healthway.  He is right now watching his movie on handphone loudly and we are in a clinic.  This disgraceful personnel need major advocation on his manners, communication skill and proffesionalism.
